TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ExpressionBuilderCollection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection
Public NotInheritable Class ExpressionBuilderCollection Inherits ConfigurationElementCollection

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of objects. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ExpressionBuilderCollection> class does not refer to any actual element in the underlying configuration file. It is a construct that allows easy access to the compilation information it contains.
## Examples This section provides two code examples. The first demonstrates how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ExpressionBuilderCollection> class. The second demonstrates how to use members of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ExpressionBuilderCollection> class.
The following configuration file example shows how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ExpressionBuilderCollection> class.
``` <system.web> <compilation> <expressionBuilders> <add expressionPrefix="Resources" type="System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder"/> <add expressionPrefix="ConnectionStrings" type="System.Web.Compilation. ConnectionStringsExpressionBuilder"/> <add expressionPrefix="AppSettings" type="System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder" /> </expressionBuilders> </compilation> </system.web> ```
The following code example demonstrates how to use members of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ExpressionBuilderCollection> class.
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ExpressionBuilderCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ExpressionBuilderCollection/CS/ExpressionBuilderCollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ExpressionBuilderCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ExpressionBuilderCollection/VB/ExpressionBuilderCollection.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(class System.Web.Configuration.ExpressionBuilder buildProvider) cil managed

Docs.param: A string value specifying the reference.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Adds an <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ExpressionBuilder> object to the collection. If the assembly object is not initialized with assembly information, an exception is thrown. If the assembly object already exists in the collection, the statement is ignored.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ExpressionBuilderCollection.Add%2A> method. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ExpressionBuilderCollection> class.
